column4: Does anyone know if it is legal to resell OpenOffice under a different name? Check out what appeared in gmail in my margins: http://www.officebestdeall.com/
it is legal but you have to state that it is derived from openoffice
also it is not ethical unless you are contributing back to the project
thanks -- I might hop on this. Just some ad copy, a landing page, and then take like 35% of the profits and pay into the OO fund.
